messages.title: JO SWINSON'S PLAN FOR BRITAIN'S FUTURE:
messages.content:
STOP BREXIT
Tackle the climate emergency
Give every child the best start in life
Build a fairer economy
Transform our mental health services

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. Will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Decent, moderate people are moving to the Lib Dems in the drive towards tactical voting. Only the Lib Dems can beat Leave here.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.economy: Provide free childcare from 9 months and give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Generate 80% of electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulate all low-income homes by 2025. Will plant 60 million trees every year to cover 1 million hectares by 2045.
issues.health: Treat mental health with the same urgency as physical health.

housing.content: Make big companies pay their fair share of taxes. We must support local businesses, workers and their families, including building more affordable and social housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm campaigning to stop Brexit, because I believe we will be thrown into economic disarray in the event of a deal, or a no-deal Brexit. If Brexit happens, we will not have money to focus on the NHS, Education, Social Care, or tackling the climate crisis. Without a strong economy, we can't afford the improvements that we desperately need.

endorsements.endorser: Ken Clarke - Conservative MP for 50 years
endorsements.endorsement: "Say no to Johnson and Corbyn and all their disarray. Stand tall and vote Lib Dem because of Brexit"

endorsements.endorser: Former Conservative Deputy PM, Michael Heseltine
endorsements.endorsement: "Millions of Tories will now vote Lib Dem because of Brexit"

quotes.text: I'm not sure yet, but I may have to protest and vote Lib Dem.
I'm impressed by Jo Swinson. I think if I was living in a lot of constituencies I would vote for the Liberal Democrats.

images.caption: Meri O'Connell A strong voice for Reading West
Meri O'Connell Building a brighter future for Reading West
